definition: A set of information that allows individuals or entities to establish communication or get in touch with one another, typically consisting of names, addresses, phone numbers, and email addresses. It is commonly used in various contexts, such as business directories, online platforms, or personal contact lists.

examples.german: Bitte geben Sie Ihre Kontaktdat an.

examples.english: The contact data will be treated confidentially.
Contact data can be updated online.
